trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of Windows Vista custom places for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog"></xref> class.
On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], this class does not have any effect.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlacesCollection"></xref> class.
Adds a custom place to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlacesCollection"></xref> collection.
The folder is added to custom places only for a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog> and is not a system or application wide change.
The folders are positioned in the custom places in the order that they are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog>.
The last one added will be at the top.
If you add a custom place to the collection that does not exist on the computer running the application, the custom place will not be shown.

For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)].
A <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that represents a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder.
Adds a custom place to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlacesCollection"></xref> collection.
The folder is added to custom places only for a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog> and is not a system or application wide change.
The folders are positioned in the custom places in the order that they are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog>.
The last one added will be at the top.
A folder path to the custom place.
